warning.title: Limited support
warning.description: By using your own modem, OVHcloud technical support is limited. You are responsible for configuring and troubleshooting your equipment.

infos.title: Your modem
infos.noModemHint: Declare your personal modem to receive connection settings.
infos.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this modem? You will need to re-declare it if you want to use it again.

credentials.confirmRegenerate: Are you sure you want to regenerate the password? You will need to reconfigure your modem.

vlan.infoBanner: These VLANs are required for your OVHcloud fiber connection to work properly.

help.title: Help
help.vlanId: Virtual network identifier to configure on your modem
help.cos: Traffic priority (Class of Service) for quality of service

guides.title: Configuration guides
guides.description: Select your modem brand to access the detailed configuration guide.
guides.notListed: Your modem is not in the list?
